about_the_game:
Unlock everything Taboo University has to offer with the official Walkthrough DLC!

This guide is your go-to for navigating all the twists and turns of ViNovella University without missing a single important detail.

With this walkthrough, you'll hit those key scenes faster and get the most out of your game. Whether you’re diving into all the romantic storylines or aiming to see every possible ending, this guide has got your back. It’s packed with step-by-step instructions on how to build relationships with each character and make the key decisions that will shape your entire experience.

Plus, the game itself will include hints that show you the consequences of your choices, and you’ll find a detailed PDF in the game folder with tips on how to unlock specific content.

Key Features:

  • Detailed guides for all character routes
  • Step-by-step instructions for unlocking every scene
  • Tips for maximizing your faction influence
  • Hints system integrated into the game

We highly recommend playing through the game at least once on your own first—this guide is loaded with spoilers that could really change how you experience your first playthrough.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. The characters depicted in the game are 18 years old of age or older. 

Includes explicit sexual content and behavior some viewers may find offensive or disturbing. Characters engage in oral, vaginal, and anal sex acts, as well as non-penetrative sexual acts. There are scenes of sexual intercourse with pregnant characters. Bondage, sexual domination and submission, pet play, the use of sex toys, bodily fluids, urination, and alternative sexual lifestyles are portrayed.

Strong language is frequently used throughout. Mature themes, such as blackmailing, drugs, and non-consensual sex, are mentioned. The game contains use of alcohol and tobacco. 

The story, characters, names, and actions are fictitious, and any similarity to real life is coincidental and unintended.
